articles.description: India vs UAE Highlights Women's Asia Cup 2022: India Women sealed a 104-run win vs UAE Women in their third fixture of Women’s Asia Cup 2022. Follow highlights of IND W vs UAE W from Sylhet, here.

articles.title: Swimmer Sophie Soon shares journey with her guide dog - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The 25-year-old reflects on the highs and lows of dealing with visual impairment, and how her guide dog Orinda has become her eyes, helping her avoid obstacles when she’s out and about. As told to CNA Women’s Sharon Salim.
articles.content: A big defining moment happened when I was about two years old, sitting in the front seat of the car, next to my dad. I remember we had parked the car as my mum rushed out to run some errands. My dad … [+1383 chars]
